item.title: CVE-2022-4501|2024-08-03T01:41:45.567Z -- nasir179125 -- mega%20addons%20for%20wpbakery%20page%20builder
item.description: The Mega Addons plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to authorization bypass due to a missing capability check on the vc_saving_data function in versions up to, and including, 4.2.7. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level permissions and above, to update the plugin's settings.
